trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Marysville
There were no other sightings in Marysville on or around July 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the neighborhood fireworks in my backyard with my kids and at approxiametely 22:15 I saw an orange orb of light coming from the west side of town. It looked about 1000ft or so in the air and seemed to be floating in an easterly direction. The orange ball of light lasted for about 3 minutes and then disappeared. Both of my kids were witnessed this event. Then in the east side of town, two more orange orbs of light about the same height appeared in the sky and were headed west and seemed to be floating. At first I thought it was a meteor shower but after seeing 7 of these lights total within an hour, I concluded that they may have been flares but not 100% sure. Each time the orange orbs of light disappeared in about 3 to 5 minutes.
